<div class="span9">
<h2>Fetal and Neonatal Research: From Basic Science to Clinical Practice</h2>
<p>
This highly respected and frequently cited journal is a prime source of information in the area of fetal and neonatal research. Original papers present research on all aspects of neonatology, fetal medicine and developmental biology. These papers encompass both basic science and clinical research including randomized trials, novel observational studies and epidemiology. Basic science research covers molecular biology, molecular genetics, physiology, biochemistry and pharmacology in fetal and neonatal life. In addition to the classic features the journal accepts papers for sections "Research Briefings", "Sources of Neonatal Medicine" (historical pieces) and "Global Neonatal Research". Papers reporting the results of animal studies should be based upon hypotheses that relate to developmental processes or disorders in the human fetus or neonate.
</p>
<p class="mt-40"><a href="https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/UENPS-surveys" class="NoArrow pl-0" target="_blank" title="Join our survey in Infection, Prevention and Control (IPC) practices in the NICU (this link will open in a new window)"><img src="https://karger.silverchair-cdn.com/ImageLibrary/ads/Ad_NEO_IPC_400px.jpg?versionId=47473" alt="NICU banner" data-cmp-info="10"></a></p>

<div class="self-serve_box">
<div class="box-content">
<h3 class="text-center">UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey</h3>
<p>The <a href="https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/UENPS-surveys" target="_blank">NeoIPC project</a>, funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme, aims to improve IPC practices in neonatal care units. By participating in this survey, you will gain valuable insights into the practices currently in use, to help identify best practices.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a href="https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/UENPS-surveys" target="_blank" aria-label="Learn more about the UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey" class="btn btn-passiv" tabindex="0">Learn more</a></p>

<div class="self-serve_box">
<div class="box-content">
<h3 class="text-center"><em>NEONATOLOGY</em> is the official journal of UENPS</h3>
<p>Karger proudly announces the affiliation of <em>Neonatology</em> with the <em>Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies (UENPS)</em>, designating Neonatology as the official journal of UENPS. Through this collaboration, we seek to expand our impact by delivering cutting-edge research to researchers and healthcare providers in the field of Neonatal and Perinatal Medicine.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a href="https://www.uenps.eu/" target="_blank" aria-label="More information about Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies – UENPS " class="btn btn-passiv" tabindex="0">More information</a></p>
</div>

/*CLIENT CUSTOM CSS*/.cmpbox, .cmpbox * {
    font-family: 'Open Sans',Verdana,Arial,sans-serif !important;
}

.cmpboxtxt, .cmpprpsdescr {
    text-align: left !important;
}

#cmpbox a::before {
    display:none;
}

#cmpbox .cmpmore {
    float: none;
    width: 100%;
    display: block;    
}
    #cmpbox .cmpmore a::before {
        display: inline-block;
    }
    #cmpbox .cmpmore a:hover {
        color: #F89300;
        text-decoration: none;
    }


a:hover p, 
a:hover span:not(.label-info) {
    color: #000000 !important;
}

a.cmpboxbtn:hover, a.cmpboxbtn:focus {
    color: #000000 !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
}

.cmpfullscreen .cmpboxbtn,
.cmpboxbtn,
.cmpboxbtn span {
    text-transform: uppercase !important;
}
    .cmpfullscreen .cmpboxbtn,
    .cmpboxbtn:hover,
    .cmpboxbtn:hover span {
        color: #000000 !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }


.cmpboxbtnscustomchoices .cmpmorelink.cmpmorelinkcustomchoices.cmpboxbtn {
    text-decoration: none !important;
}



.cmpbox.cmpfullscreen {
    max-height: 80% !important;
    max-width: 80% !important;
}

.cmpfullscreen .cmpmorelink, 
.cmpfullscreen A.cmpmorelink, 
.cmpfullscreen A.cmpmorelink:link {
    margin-top: 10px;
} 


.cmpmorelink, 
A.cmpmorelink, 
A.cmpmorelink:link {
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}
.cmpmorelink:hover, 
A.cmpmorelink:hover, 
A.cmpmorelink:link:hover {
    color: #f89300 !important;
}
.cmpboxbtnscustomchoices .cmpmorelink.cmpmorelinkcustomchoices::before,
.cmpmorelink:before, 
A.cmpmorelink:before, 
A.cmpmorelink:link:before {
    font-family: "Font Awesome 6 Pro";
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: inherit;
    content: "\f054";
    color: #f89300 !important;
    margin-right: 3px;
    text-decoration: none;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    display: inline-block !important;
    white-space: nowrap;
}


.cmpwelcomeprps {
    width: auto !important;
    margin-right: 20px !important;
}

.cmpboxdetails table.cmptbl th#cmpboxlabelprps1,
.cmpboxdetails table.cmptbl th#cmpallvend1 {
    text-align: left !important;
    padding-left: 5px;
}

.cmpcookiesdescrbox .cmpcookiesdescrtable {
    margin: 10px 0 !important;
}



/* HEADLINE                                                */
/* ------------------------------------------------------- */
@media (max-width: 990px)  {
    .cmpboxtxtdiv .cmpboxhl {
        font-size: 20px !important;
    }
}



/* BUTTONS                                                 */ 
/* ------------------------------------------------------- */
.cmpboxbtns {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-wrap: wrap !important;
    justify-content: center !important;
}

.cmpboxbtns.cmpboxbtn {
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    height: 40px;
    line-height: 40px;
}
    .cmpboxbtns.cmpboxbtn span {
        line-height: 18px !important;
    }


/* BUTTON AKTIV (.cmpboxbtnsave, .cmpboxbtnyes, .cmpboxbtnaccept) */
/* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave, 
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:link,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnaccept,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnacceptcustomchoices {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #000000 !important;
    background-color: #F89300 !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    transition: none !important;
    transform: none !important;
}
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:hover, 
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:link:hover,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes:hover,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnaccept:hover,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnacceptcustomchoices:hover {
        color: #000000 !important;
        background-color: #ffffff !important;
        border: 1px solid #000000 !important;        
        transition: none !important;
        transform: none !important;
    }
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:hover span, 
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:link:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnaccept:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnacceptcustomchoices:hover:span {
        color: #000000 !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
        border: none !important;
    }


/* BUTTON PASSIV (.cmpboxbtncustom, .cmpboxbtnno) */
/* ---------------------------------------------- */
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtncustom,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnno,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes.cmpboxbtnyescustomchoices {
    color: #000000 !important;
    background-color: #ffffff !important;
    border: 1px solid #F89300 !important;        
    transition: none !important;
    transform: none !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
}
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtncustom:hover,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnno:hover,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes.cmpboxbtnyescustomchoices:hover {
        color: #000000 !important;
        background-color: #ffffff !important;
        border: 1px solid #000000 !important;        
        transition: none !important;
        transform: none !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtncustom:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnno:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes.cmpboxbtnyescustomchoices:hover span {
        color: #000000 !important;
        border: none !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }

.cmpboxnaviitem { 
    border-radius: 0px !important; 
}

.cmpfullscreen .cmpboxbtn, .cmpboxbtn, .cmpboxbtn span, 
.cmpboxbtn span#cmpbntyestxt,
.cmpboxbtn span#cmpbntcustomtxt,
.cmpboxbtn span#cmpbntnotxt {
    color: #000000 !important;
}


@media (max-height: 926px) and (max-width: 500px) {
    .cmpbox {
        max-height: 90% !important;
        min-height: 90% !important;
    }
    .cmpwelcomeprps {
        width: auto !important;
    }

    .cmpboxbtns .cmpmore {
        margin-top: 20px !important;
    }

  • Connect with Us

Fetal and Neonatal Research: From Basic Science to Clinical Practice

This highly respected and frequently cited journal is a prime source of information in the area of fetal and neonatal research. Original papers present research on all aspects of neonatology, fetal medicine and developmental biology. These papers encompass both basic science and clinical research including randomized trials, novel observational studies and epidemiology. Basic science research covers molecular biology, molecular genetics, physiology, biochemistry and pharmacology in fetal and neonatal life. In addition to the classic features the journal accepts papers for sections "Research Briefings", "Sources of Neonatal Medicine" (historical pieces) and "Global Neonatal Research". Papers reporting the results of animal studies should be based upon hypotheses that relate to developmental processes or disorders in the human fetus or neonate.

UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey

The , funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme, aims to improve IPC practices in neonatal care units. By participating in this survey, you will gain valuable insights into the practices currently in use, to help identify best practices.

NEONATOLOGY is the official journal of UENPS

Karger proudly announces the affiliation of Neonatology with the Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies (UENPS), designating Neonatology as the official journal of UENPS. Through this collaboration, we seek to expand our impact by delivering cutting-edge research to researchers and healthcare providers in the field of Neonatal and Perinatal Medicine.

<div class="span9">
<h2>Fetal and Neonatal Research: From Basic Science to Clinical Practice</h2>
<p>
This highly respected and frequently cited journal is a prime source of information in the area of fetal and neonatal research. Original papers present research on all aspects of neonatology, fetal medicine and developmental biology. These papers encompass both basic science and clinical research including randomized trials, novel observational studies and epidemiology. Basic science research covers molecular biology, molecular genetics, physiology, biochemistry and pharmacology in fetal and neonatal life. In addition to the classic features the journal accepts papers for sections "Research Briefings", "Sources of Neonatal Medicine" (historical pieces) and "Global Neonatal Research". Papers reporting the results of animal studies should be based upon hypotheses that relate to developmental processes or disorders in the human fetus or neonate.
</p>
<p class="mt-40"><a href="https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/UENPS-surveys" class="NoArrow pl-0" target="_blank" title="Join our survey in Infection, Prevention and Control (IPC) practices in the NICU (this link will open in a new window)"><img src="https://karger.silverchair-cdn.com/ImageLibrary/ads/Ad_NEO_IPC_400px.jpg?versionId=47473" alt="NICU banner" data-cmp-info="10"></a></p>

<h3 class="text-center">UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey</h3>
<p>The <a href="https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/UENPS-surveys" target="_blank">NeoIPC project</a>, funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme, aims to improve IPC practices in neonatal care units. By participating in this survey, you will gain valuable insights into the practices currently in use, to help identify best practices.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a href="https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/UENPS-surveys" target="_blank" aria-label="Learn more about the UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey" class="btn btn-passiv" tabindex="0">Learn more</a></p>

<div class="self-serve_box">
<div class="box-content">
<h3 class="text-center"><em>NEONATOLOGY</em> is the official journal of UENPS</h3>
<p>Karger proudly announces the affiliation of <em>Neonatology</em> with the <em>Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies (UENPS)</em>, designating Neonatology as the official journal of UENPS. Through this collaboration, we seek to expand our impact by delivering cutting-edge research to researchers and healthcare providers in the field of Neonatal and Perinatal Medicine.</p>
<p class="text-center"><a href="https://www.uenps.eu/" target="_blank" aria-label="More information about Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies – UENPS " class="btn btn-passiv" tabindex="0">More information</a></p>

/*CLIENT CUSTOM CSS*/.cmpbox, .cmpbox * {
    font-family: 'Open Sans',Verdana,Arial,sans-serif !important;
}

.cmpboxtxt, .cmpprpsdescr {
    text-align: left !important;
}

#cmpbox a::before {
    display:none;
}

#cmpbox .cmpmore {
    float: none;
    width: 100%;
    display: block;    
}
    #cmpbox .cmpmore a::before {
        display: inline-block;
    }
    #cmpbox .cmpmore a:hover {
        color: #F89300;
        text-decoration: none;
    }


a:hover p, 
a:hover span:not(.label-info) {
    color: #000000 !important;
}

a.cmpboxbtn:hover, a.cmpboxbtn:focus {
    color: #000000 !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
}

.cmpfullscreen .cmpboxbtn,
.cmpboxbtn,
.cmpboxbtn span {
    text-transform: uppercase !important;
}
    .cmpfullscreen .cmpboxbtn,
    .cmpboxbtn:hover,
    .cmpboxbtn:hover span {
        color: #000000 !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }


.cmpboxbtnscustomchoices .cmpmorelink.cmpmorelinkcustomchoices.cmpboxbtn {
    text-decoration: none !important;
}



.cmpbox.cmpfullscreen {
    max-height: 80% !important;
    max-width: 80% !important;
}

.cmpfullscreen .cmpmorelink, 
.cmpfullscreen A.cmpmorelink, 
.cmpfullscreen A.cmpmorelink:link {
    margin-top: 10px;
} 


.cmpmorelink, 
A.cmpmorelink, 
A.cmpmorelink:link {
    text-decoration: underline !important;
}
.cmpmorelink:hover, 
A.cmpmorelink:hover, 
A.cmpmorelink:link:hover {
    color: #f89300 !important;
}
.cmpboxbtnscustomchoices .cmpmorelink.cmpmorelinkcustomchoices::before,
.cmpmorelink:before, 
A.cmpmorelink:before, 
A.cmpmorelink:link:before {
    font-family: "Font Awesome 6 Pro";
    font-weight: 900;
    font-size: inherit;
    content: "\f054";
    color: #f89300 !important;
    margin-right: 3px;
    text-decoration: none;
    position: relative;
    left: 0;
    display: inline-block !important;
    white-space: nowrap;
}


.cmpwelcomeprps {
    width: auto !important;
    margin-right: 20px !important;
}

.cmpboxdetails table.cmptbl th#cmpboxlabelprps1,
.cmpboxdetails table.cmptbl th#cmpallvend1 {
    text-align: left !important;
    padding-left: 5px;
}

.cmpcookiesdescrbox .cmpcookiesdescrtable {
    margin: 10px 0 !important;
}



/* HEADLINE                                                */
/* ------------------------------------------------------- */
@media (max-width: 990px)  {
    .cmpboxtxtdiv .cmpboxhl {
        font-size: 20px !important;
    }
}



/* BUTTONS                                                 */ 
/* ------------------------------------------------------- */
.cmpboxbtns {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-wrap: wrap !important;
    justify-content: center !important;
}

.cmpboxbtns.cmpboxbtn {
    padding-top: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
    height: 40px;
    line-height: 40px;
}
    .cmpboxbtns.cmpboxbtn span {
        line-height: 18px !important;
    }


/* BUTTON AKTIV (.cmpboxbtnsave, .cmpboxbtnyes, .cmpboxbtnaccept) */
/* -------------------------------------------------------------- */
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave, 
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:link,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnaccept,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnacceptcustomchoices {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #000000 !important;
    background-color: #F89300 !important;
    font-weight: bold !important;
    transition: none !important;
    transform: none !important;
}
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:hover, 
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:link:hover,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes:hover,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnaccept:hover,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnacceptcustomchoices:hover {
        color: #000000 !important;
        background-color: #ffffff !important;
        border: 1px solid #000000 !important;        
        transition: none !important;
        transform: none !important;
    }
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:hover span, 
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnsave:link:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnaccept:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnacceptcustomchoices:hover:span {
        color: #000000 !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
        border: none !important;
    }


/* BUTTON PASSIV (.cmpboxbtncustom, .cmpboxbtnno) */
/* ---------------------------------------------- */
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtncustom,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnno,
.cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes.cmpboxbtnyescustomchoices {
    color: #000000 !important;
    background-color: #ffffff !important;
    border: 1px solid #F89300 !important;        
    transition: none !important;
    transform: none !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
}
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtncustom:hover,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnno:hover,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes.cmpboxbtnyescustomchoices:hover {
        color: #000000 !important;
        background-color: #ffffff !important;
        border: 1px solid #000000 !important;        
        transition: none !important;
        transform: none !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtncustom:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnno:hover span,
    .cmpboxbtn.cmpboxbtnyes.cmpboxbtnyescustomchoices:hover span {
        color: #000000 !important;
        border: none !important;
        text-decoration: none !important;
    }

.cmpboxnaviitem { 
    border-radius: 0px !important; 
}

.cmpfullscreen .cmpboxbtn, .cmpboxbtn, .cmpboxbtn span, 
.cmpboxbtn span#cmpbntyestxt,
.cmpboxbtn span#cmpbntcustomtxt,
.cmpboxbtn span#cmpbntnotxt {
    color: #000000 !important;
}


@media (max-height: 926px) and (max-width: 500px) {
    .cmpbox {
        max-height: 90% !important;
        min-height: 90% !important;
    }
    .cmpwelcomeprps {
        width: auto !important;
    }

    .cmpboxbtns .cmpmore {
        margin-top: 20px !important;
    }
}.cmpbox, .cmpbox *{font-family:Open Sans !important;}.cmplogo {right: 15px; top: 15px;}

Submit manuscript

  • News & Highlights

  • Connect with Us

Fetal and Neonatal Research: From Basic Science to Clinical Practice

This highly respected and frequently cited journal is a prime source of information in the area of fetal and neonatal research. Original papers present research on all aspects of neonatology, fetal medicine and developmental biology. These papers encompass both basic science and clinical research including randomized trials, novel observational studies and epidemiology. Basic science research covers molecular biology, molecular genetics, physiology, biochemistry and pharmacology in fetal and neonatal life. In addition to the classic features the journal accepts papers for sections "Research Briefings", "Sources of Neonatal Medicine" (historical pieces) and "Global Neonatal Research". Papers reporting the results of animal studies should be based upon hypotheses that relate to developmental processes or disorders in the human fetus or neonate.

UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey

The , funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme, aims to improve IPC practices in neonatal care units. By participating in this survey, you will gain valuable insights into the practices currently in use, to help identify best practices.

NEONATOLOGY is the official journal of UENPS

Karger proudly announces the affiliation of Neonatology with the Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies (UENPS), designating Neonatology as the official journal of UENPS. Through this collaboration, we seek to expand our impact by delivering cutting-edge research to researchers and healthcare providers in the field of Neonatal and Perinatal Medicine.

##### Fetal and Neonatal Research

![Anniversary badge: 65 years Neonatology](https://karger.silverchair-cdn.com/ImageLibrary/selfserve/anniversary-65-years.png?versionId=47473)
## Fetal and Neonatal Research: From Basic Science to Clinical Practice
This highly respected and frequently cited journal is a prime source of information in the area of fetal and neonatal research. Original papers present research on all aspects of neonatology, fetal medicine and developmental biology. These papers encompass both basic science and clinical research including randomized trials, novel observational studies and epidemiology. Basic science research covers molecular biology, molecular genetics, physiology, biochemistry and pharmacology in fetal and neonatal life. In addition to the classic features the journal accepts papers for sections "Research Briefings", "Sources of Neonatal Medicine" (historical pieces) and "Global Neonatal Research". Papers reporting the results of animal studies should be based upon hypotheses that relate to developmental processes or disorders in the human fetus or neonate.

### Research Viewpoints
Discover highlights from the latest scientific research, interviews with leading scientists, the latest developments from Karger and across the publishing industry in our research blog.
[Explore Now](https://researchviewpoints.karger.com/)
### UENPS & European Project NeoIPC Survey
The , funded by the European Union’s Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme, aims to improve IPC practices in neonatal care units. By participating in this survey, you will gain valuable insights into the practices currently in use, to help identify best practices.
### _NEONATOLOGY_ is the official journal of UENPS
Karger proudly announces the affiliation of _Neonatology_ with the _Union of European Neonatal and Perinatal Societies (UENPS)_ , designating Neonatology as the official journal of UENPS. Through this collaboration, we seek to expand our impact by delivering cutting-edge research to researchers and healthcare providers in the field of Neonatal and Perinatal Medicine.
